name: Handmade Miniature Book Necklace
description: A sweet black ribbon and cord necklace with a handmade miniature book (the book does open to reveal the pages).  I can write a special message inside if you would like.  The book dangles from red beads.  My favorite is the heart-shaped lock with the matching heart-shaped key.  Perfect for the book lover.

name: Hand wrapped "nest" with eggs bookmark
description: Hand wrapped wire nest with eggs staff-style bookmark.   No two are alike.  This can be made into a necklace also........will do custom orders....

name: Miniature Book Bookmark
description: Staff style bookmark with miniature handmade miniature book.  There are two styles here to choose from - NO TWO are alike.  When ordering, be sure and let me know which one you want unless you want two and there would be a discount to purchase two.  Just contact me with any questions.  One has keyhole hardware and the other has a black ribbon book spine.  Both books actually open and you can see the hand sewn signature pages.  I can make a miniature book necklace also upon request.

name: Miniature Book Staff Bookmark with key charm
description: A handmade with love....miniature book with keyhole hardware and a small key charm to match.  The book has been left open to expose the pages and book paper inside.

name: Beaded Thong Bookmark - Tree of Life
description:
Beautiful beaded thong bookmark made out of durable cording that will not damage your book pages.  The cord length is 11 inches long and this does not include the added length of dangling charms/beads. It will fit your paperback and hardback books. This book thong has tree and leaf charms with beads. 

My current project is Making A Bookmark A Day for 365 Days.  I made this on Day Three.  You can read more about my progress on my blog lazylizardstudio.blogspot.com.  I also do custom orders.  

Thank you for looking.

Any further questions, please contact me.

Thank you for looking!
